price: 他们中有倾听你的，难道你能使聋子闻道吗？即便他们也不明理。
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَسۡتَمِعُونَ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yastamiʿūna ilayka afa-anta tus'miʿu al-ṣuma walaw kānū lā yaʿqilūna
